channel.title: Irene Reid on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Irene Reid on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: What do we mean by prevention?
item.description: VM - Vivien Moffat GW - Glenda Watt BM - Betty Milton IR - Irene Reid DY - Derek Young GP - Gerry Power AM - Agnes McGroarty Plan P, New Approaches to Prevention with older People, is an Iriss project which addresses the issue of social isolation and loneliness amongst older people. Each quarter, the Advisory Group records a group discussion about a related aspect of prevention. This is the third discussion.
